title: Betty Dain Chemical Neutralizing Cap for Processing Curls and Chemical Treatments - Soft Reusable Vinyl with Sealed Pocket to Catch Chemical Run-off, Ideal for Perms and Treatments using Chemicals
features: PERM CRAZE: The perm-craze is back! Our neutralizing bib is an essential for processing curls and other chemical treatments with minimal damage.
SAFE TREATMENT: The Betty Dain Neutralizing Cap features a durable, vinyl-sealed pocket, so you can apply treatments safely and with confidence.
REUSABLE VINYL: Soft reusable vinyl neutralizing bib and sealed pocket designed to catch chemical run-off, Touch and close front closure

TOOLS FOR MODERN ARTISTS: Innovation is the Stamp of Betty Dain. Current with the latest trends, Betty Dain designs and manufactures stylish salon apparel and hair color accessories that cater to the functionality and fashion preferences for todays hair professional.
LISTENING TO YOUR NEEDS: Designed and manufactured by Betty Dain, which has listened to the needs of the hair industry and created high-quality solutions for over 60 years.
